title: Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sports and Media, hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as 

the Digital Services Act 2024 

(Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited digital service act 2024 (commencement) order 2024

title: Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sports and Media, hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The 17th day of February 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 17th day of February 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 

Digital Services Act 2024 (No. 2 of 2024) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 February, 2024. 

SIMON COVENEY, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 23rd February, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [53] 3
